# SetControlValue

**Instance Method**

Sets the Boolean value of the control.

## Declaration

```swift
kern_return_t SetControlValue(bool in_control_value);
```

## Parameters

- **in_control_value**: The Boolean value to set.

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/DriverKit/kIOReturnSuccess] on success, or another value if an error occurs. For a list of error codes, see [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/DriverKit/error-codes].

## Discussion

If successful, changing the control value sends a notification to the host to update the object state.

This method synchronizes by using the work queue created by the object.

## Accessing the Value

- **GetControlValue**: Gets the Boolean value of the control.
